txt_en: Do you want to make a Jack-o'-lantern?
txt_cn: 你想做个南瓜灯吗？

txt_en: I am the master of my own destiny.
txt_cn: 我命由我不由天。

txt_en: The memory is a muscle that must be exercised.
txt_cn: 记忆就像一块肌肉，必须要勤运动。

txt_en: People follow the brave, not the high.
txt_cn: 人们追随勇敢者，而不是位高者。

txt_en: The struggle makes everything all the more worth it.
txt_cn: 奋斗让一切都变得更有价值。

txt_en: The most exhausting thing in life is being insincere.
txt_cn: 生活中最使人筋疲力尽的事是弄虚作假。

txt_en: Brace yourself. Winter is coming.
txt_cn: 做好保暖，凛冬将至。

txt_en: What we call "failure" is not falling down, but the staying down.
txt_cn: 所谓“失败”不是跌倒，而是就此躺平。

txt_en: Studies serve for delight, for ornament and for ability.
txt_cn: 读书足以怡情，足以博彩，足以长才。

txt_en: To infinity and beyond!
txt_cn: 飞向宇宙，浩瀚无垠！

txt_en: Money burns a hole in my pocket!
txt_cn: 我兜儿里的钱呢！

txt_en: Ultimately, it is the desire, not the desired, that we love.
txt_cn: 归根结底，我们爱的不是欲望之物，而是欲望本身。

txt_en: Pain is inevitable. Suffering is optional.
txt_cn: 痛是难免的，苦却是甘愿的。

txt_en: Miracles happen every day.
txt_cn: 奇迹每天都在发生。

txt_en: Words and ideas can change the world.
txt_cn: 文字和思想能改变世界。

txt_en: After all, tomorrow is another day.
txt_cn: 不管怎样，明天又是新的一天。

txt_en: Life is short but its tortuous way is long.
txt_cn: 人生不满百，常怀千岁忧。

txt_en: An open mind is a gold mine.
txt_cn: 解放思想，黄金万两。

txt_en: If you don't walk out, you will think that this is the whole world.
txt_cn: 走出去，才能看到更大的世界。

txt_en: Before you meet someone who loves you more, you must love yourself well.
txt_cn: 在遇到更爱自己的人之前，一定要好好爱自己。

txt_en: Kings have long arms.
txt_cn: 普天之下，莫非王土。

txt_en: The snow whispers around me.
txt_cn: 雪花萦绕在我耳边，窃窃私语。

txt_en: The greater the man, the more restrained his anger.
txt_cn: 人越伟大，越能克制怒火。

txt_en: Live for the moment.
txt_cn: 活在当下。

txt_en: A drop of water in need, shall be returned with a spring in deed.
txt_cn: 滴水之恩，涌泉相报。

txt_en: To be a sailor of the world, bound for all ports.
txt_cn: 做世界的水手，游遍所有的港口。
